name: OmniCat
description: OmniCat is the first omni-chain meme coin powered by LayerZero. OMNI exists on 6 EVM chains as well as Solana. Users are able to bridge and arb all 7 pools on each ecosystem seamlessly thanks to the OFT standard created by LayerZero. We currently exist on Ethereum, Arbitrum, Solana, Polygon, Canto, BSC, and Base.
